### Welcome to Our Research Group {.mt-4}

We investigate how **data and technology** can transform education at Tallinn University, bridging:
- Learning sciences with computational analytics  
- Pedagogical theories with AI-driven tools  
- Classroom practices with scalable innovations  

Our work focuses on ethical, evidence-based solutions for modern education challenges.
